select count(id) from p_patient where 1=1 and status != -1
and flag=1
and flag=1 and to_days(enter_time) = to_days(now())
and flag=0 and to_days(exit_time) = to_days(now())
and flag=1 and DATE_FORMAT( enter_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )
and flag=0 and DATE_FORMAT( exit_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )

select IFNULL(db.id,"") as bed_code_id, IFNULL(db.bed_name,"") as bed_code_name, IFNULL(p.visit_id,"") as visit_id, IFNULL(p.visit_code,"") as visit_code, IFNULL(p.id,"") as patient_id, p.int_id, IFNULL(p.name,"") as name, IFNULL(p.age,"") as age, CASE WHEN(p.sex=0) THEN "女" WHEN(p.sex=1) THEN "男" ELSE "" END as sex, IFNULL(p.enter_time,"") as enter_time, IFNULL(p.exit_time,"") as exit_time, CASE WHEN(p.flag=0) THEN "出科" WHEN(p.flag=1) THEN "在科" ELSE "" END as flag, IFNULL(p.exit_type,"") as exit_type, IFNULL(d.department_name,"") as department_name, IFNULL(c.department_name,"") as department_name, IFNULL(p.bed_code,"") as bed_code, IFNULL(p.visit_time,"") as visit_time, CASE WHEN(p.unplanned=0) THEN "否" WHEN(p.unplanned=1) THEN "是" ELSE "" END as unplanned, IFNULL(p.illness_state,"") as illness_state, IFNULL(u.user_name,"") as docter, IFNULL(tu.user_name,"") as nurse, IFNULL(p.operation_time,"") as operation_time, IFNULL(p.operation_name,"") as operation_name, IFNULL(p.diagnosis_name,"") as diagnosis_name, IFNULL(p.allergies,"") as allergies, IFNULL(p.positive,"") as positive, IFNULL(to_days(now()) - to_days(p.enter_time),"") as department_days, IFNULL(to_days(now()) - to_days(p.operation_time),"") as operation_days FROM dict_bed db LEFT JOIN p_patient p ON db.bed_code=p.bed_code and p.flag =1 and p.status != -1 LEFT JOIN dict_department d ON p.department_code = d.department_code LEFT JOIN dict_department c ON p.to_department_code = c.department_code LEFT JOIN table_user u ON p.doctor_code = u.work_number LEFT JOIN table_user tu ON p.nurse_code = tu.work_number where 1=1 and db.status=1 order by db.bed_code,p.enter_time desc

select
from p_patient where 1=1 and status != -1
and flag=#{flag} and ( bed_code is null OR bed_code="")
and flag=#{flag}

select count(id) FROM p_patient p where 1=1 and status != -1
and flag= 1 and ( date_format(enter_time,'%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{enterStartTime},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{enterEndTime},'%Y%m%d') )
and flag= 0 and ( date_format(exit_time,'%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{exitStartTime},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{exitEndTime},'%Y%m%d') )
and exit_type = #{exitType}

select IFNULL(p.department_code,"") as department_code, IFNULL(d.department_name,"") as department_name FROM p_patient p LEFT JOIN dict_department d ON p.department_code = d.department_code and p.flag = 1 and p.status != -1 and ( date_format(p.enter_time,'%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{enterStartTime},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{enterEndTime},'%Y%m%d') ) GROUP BY p.department_code

select IFNULL( p.to_department_code,"") as to_department_code, IFNULL(d.department_name,"") as department_name FROM p_patient p LEFT JOIN dict_department d ON p.to_department_code = d.department_code and p.flag = 0 and p.status != -1 and ( date_format(p.exit_time,'%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{exitStartTime},'%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{exitEndTime},'%Y%m%d') ) GROUP BY p.to_department_code
